scan_table_check.description: UI Pages that do not have a corresponding specific "UI Page" ACL will use the default "UI Page" ACL, which may grant access to unintended users. Each specific UI Page should hence have a specific ACL that defines the specific access based on specific roles or other criteria. Or if the UI Page is intended to be publicly available, a corresponding sys_public record should exist.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - UI Page ACL
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Add a specific ACL to protect the specific UI Page or add a sys_public record to make the UI Page publicly available.
scan_table_check.short_description: CodeSanity - UI Page must have a specific ACL
